pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū anācāraṁ ācaritvā “aññāṇakena āpannāti jānantū”ti pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.3_1: ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṁ uddesaṁ āgacchatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.4_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.5_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṁ vakkhanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.6_1: ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṁ uddesaṁ āgacchatī’”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.7_0: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṁ vadetha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.8_1: ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṁ uddesaṁ āgacchatī’”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.11_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṁ vakkhatha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.12_1: ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṁ uddesaṁ āgacchatī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.14_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.15.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu anvaddhamāsaṁ pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṁ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.16_1: ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṁ uddesaṁ āgacchatī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.17_0: Tañce bhikkhuṁ aññe bhikkhū jāneyyuṁ nisinnapubbaṁ iminā bhikkhunā dvattikkhattuṁ pātimokkhe uddissamāne,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.17_2: na ca tassa bhikkhuno aññāṇakena mutti atthi,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.17_3: yañca tattha āpattiṁ āpanno tañca yathādhammo kāretabbo,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.18_2: yaṁ tvaṁ pātimokkhe uddissamāne na sādhukaṁ aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi karosī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.11_0: “aññāṇakena āpannoti jānantū”ti pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.12_1: ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṁ uddesaṁ āgacchatī”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.13_0: Tañce mohetukāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ aññe bhikkhū jāneyyuṁ nisinnapubbaṁ iminā bhikkhunā dvattikkhattuṁ pātimokkhe uddissamāne,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.13_2: na ca tassa bhikkhuno aññāṇakena mutti atthi,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.17_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne na sādhukaṁ aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.18_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno mohaṁ āropeyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.21_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne na sādhukaṁ aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.23_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno mohassa āropanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.26_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
